actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the taxation of social security benefits and tier 1 and tier 2 railroad retirement benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the tax on social security and tier 1 and tier 2 railroad retirement benefits.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the taxation of social security benefits and tier 1 and tier 2 railroad retirement benefits.
